thread.title: Head of CDC quits over report on stock holdings

title: Head of CDC quits over report on stock holdings

organizations.name: u.s. department of health and human services
u.s. centers for disease control and prevention

text:
Head of CDC quits over report on stock holdings 5:55am EST - 01:13 
Dr. Brenda Fitzgerald has resigned her post as director of the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention over financial conflicts of interest, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) said on Wednesday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Dr. Brenda Fitzgerald has resigned her post as director of the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention over financial conflicts of interest, the U.S. Department of Health and Human Services (HHS) said on Wednesday.
